subject: Dear friend
body:
Dear friend
My name is Charles Williams, I'm a legal counsel.
I want you to stand as a next of kin to my late
client for an Inheritance payment worth US$64,700,000. Reply to my
email for more details, Its very urgent and we need to act fast.
I await your quick response.
Regards,
Charles William

subject: Re: Dear friend
body:
Hello Charles William,

I hope this message finds you well. Your email certainly piqued my interest. I'm curious to know more about your late client and the situation at hand. Could you please provide me with more details? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Gary
